name: Everyman
description:
Everyman is a game about art, live and religion.

Based on the original artwork of the famous Dutch painter Hieronymus Bosch. Everyman walks the way of life, his actions and choices may seem small, but on the scale of morality they will have severe consequences. How will you guide everyman on his journey, and what will be your final destination? Finalist for the Bosch Art Competition 2013

https://yoctobit.wordpress.com/2013/09/30/meet-the-finalist-and-play-the-prototy...

https://www.gamescenes.org/art-game/page/39/

A game by Tjupakabra
